Package xml

Javadoc Kommentare fuer Package

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IXMLFormat
    Interface for requirement analysis classes that provide XML conversion support.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CostEstimation  
    CustomerData
    Class to hold the CustomerData of the requirement analysis.
    CustomXMLFormat  
    DataFP  
    FileOperator  
    FRequirement
    Class to hold the FunctionRequirement of the requirement analysis.
    GlossaryEntry
    Class to hold the GlossaryEntry of the requirement analysis.

    Class to hold the NonFunctionalRequirement of the requirement analysis.

    Class to hold the ProductApplication of the requirement analysis.

    Class to hold the ProductData of the requirement analysis.

    Class to hold the QualityRequirement of the requirement analysis.
    Requirement
    Created by Philipp on 13.06.17.
    RequirementsInterchangeFormat
    A JAXB conform requirement analysis format to store the data in a XML file.
    Supplement
    Class to hold the Supplement of the requirement analysis.
    TargetDefinition
    Class to hold the TargetDefinition of the requirement analysis.
    TestMain  
    TransactionFP  
    WeightFactor
    Class to hold the WeightFactors of the requirement analysis.
    XMLExporter
    Exports requirement analysis to given address in given format.
    XMLFormatFactory
    Creates an instance of the given XMLFormatType.
    XMLImporter
    Imports a requirement analysis from a given address.
    XMLManager
    The XMLManager provides methods to import or export requirement analysis in XML format.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SingletonRecreationException
    This Exception is thrown whenever there is an error while instantiating an instance of a singleton.
    XMLFormatException
    This Exception is thrown whenever the requested XML format is not supported.
    XMLMarschallingException
    This Exception is thrown whenever there is an error while creating the XML file from the requirement analysis class.
    XMLProcessingException
    This Exception is thrown whenever an error occurs in the processing of the XML file back to the data or the other way around and this error is reported by the underlying XML converter.
    XMLUnmarschallException
    This Exception is thrown whenever there is an error while recreating a requirement analysis class from the XML file.
